TEXT: A #rvengeful #rstrong #rspirit dwells here. If you slay it, you too can #gmove #gon from your #yhumble #ybeginnings. NL NL You #rcannot #rRest. Fights include weak #rIntangible #rSpirits giving #yspecial #ycard #yrewards. NL Shops are #yspirit-themed, and the #rElite can #gremove #gstarter #gcards.
